ValidationRule.description: This rule enforces that only a System Administrator or Customer Service user can activate an order.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Activated'), NOT ( OR ( $Permission.Activate_Orders, $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: CCPlus Barracuda Admin', $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Customer Services', $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Sales Operations' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only System Administrators or Customer Service Agents can activate an Order.
